subject: America's Cup
Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: The transition from the detail-driven world of monohulls to the more wide-open world of multihulls in the America's Cup requires a change of skills and a change of touch for helmsmen.
snippet: The transition from the detail-driven world of monohulls to the more wide-open world of multihulls in the America's Cup requires a change of skills and a change of touch for helmsmen.
